mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.name, u.birth_year as birthY, u.birth_month as birthM , u.birth_day as birthD, u.sex as sex, m.sex_value as sex_value FROM USER_DATA u, M_SEX m WHERE u.sex = m.sex_cd ORDER BY u.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_DATA ( id, name, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, sex ) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{birthY}, #{birthM}, #{birthD}, #{sex})
